summary: A new Follower for you based on Aela The Huntress and Tali\\\\\\\'Zorah nar Rayya from Mass Effect
descriptionHtml:
Hey there

This is my first mod for Skyrim and my first mod in general. It is a standalone follower/spouse based on Aela the Huntress. She lives and works in Riverwood, has a well made daily routine for weekdays and weekends and is available for you to recruit. She has a Daedric Bow so you might want to recruit her when you are on a higher level because it gets annoying when you are low level and she just one-hit kills everything.

What else is there to say? Leave a comment if you have a question or suggestion, I am very open to critizism and hopefully my modding skills will get better with the time so my mods will improve.

CHANGELOG 1.1

- Made a house for Tali in the mountains west of Riverwood. She will now spend her nights there and sometimes her weekends.
- Minor AI behavior changes
- Minor appereance changes


INSTALLATION

Just download the mod via NMM, there should be no complications. For manual installation just put the AAATaliZorah.bsa and the AAATaliZorah.esp in your data folder.

RECOMMENDED MOD:
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente. Be sure to also use the face textures from her mod to make my character look like in the screenshots. Feel free to upload your own pictures, probably with enb...

I will see you soon

CREDITS

Body and Face models by Caliente: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/
Nordic Hunter Light Armor by frankdema: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18056

Thanks a lot to all other modders out there for your great work and inspiration
author: Doevekin
